text: Kɨ gumazibar nɨghnɨzibar otivir bizir kabanagh mɨgei, nɨghnɨzir kuraba, ko gumaziba mɨsogharɨzir araziba, ko gumaziba ko amiziba tintinibar uari isava akuir araziba, ko poroghamiba uari bakeir araziba, ko okɨmakɨar araziba, ko kotiabar gumazibagh ifarir araziba, ko gumazibar ziabagh asɨghasɨzir araziba.
